description.en:
- [**Red Flowers**](https://drawnandquarterly.com/books/red-flowers/) (紅い花, Akai Hana), October 1967 in Garo , republished in Garo Zoukangou in June 1968 -
Depicts the anxieties of a 14 year-old girl reaching puberty. 
Also published in English in Raw Vol. 1 #7: The Torn-Again Graphix Magazine, May 1985 .Part of Volume 2 of the Yoshiharu Tsuge Gekiga Complete Works.
- [**The Lee Family**](https://drawnandquarterly.com/books/red-flowers/) (李さん一家, Ri-san Ikka), June 1967 in Garo, republished in Garo Zoukangou in June 1968 -
Part of Volume 2 of the Yoshiharu Tsuge Gekiga Complete Works.

Part of Volume 2 of the Yoshiharu Tsuge Gekiga Complete Works.
- [**Scenes from the Seaside**](https://drawnandquarterly.com/books/red-flowers/) (海辺の叙景, Umibe no Jokei), September 1967-09 in Garo, republished in Garo Zoukangou in June 1968 -

- [**Mr. Ben of Honyara Cave**](https://drawnandquarterly.com/books/red-flowers/) (ほんやら洞のべんさん, Honyaradou no Ben-san); June 1968 -

- **Jonin** (女忍), February 14th 1961 in Ryuku
- **Furuhon to Shoujo** (古本と少女),  February 2nd 1960 in Meiro , republished in Garo in September 1966
- **Mokkiriya no Shoujo** (もっきり屋の少女), August 1968
- **Yanagiya Shujin** (やなぎ屋主人), February 1970
- **Shomin Onyado** (庶民御宿), April 1975 in Manga Sunday
- **Kinjo no Keshiki** (近所の景色), October 1981 in Custom Comic

[Official English](https://drawnandquarterly.com/books/red-flowers/)

In a town with nothing, in the middle of a daily life with seemingly no signs of change, high schooler Reiji Kurose was "just" living. Family, dreams for the future, childhood friends were all binding him down to that city. He thought he would "just" keep on living like that.

Until he met her.

Is there hope in living? Is there light waiting ahead?

It's the start of a boy meets girl series which reflects the "now."
description.fr:
Dans une ville vide, au milieu d'une vie quotidienne répétitive, Reiji Kurose, lycéen, ne faisait que " vivre". 
Sa famille, ses rêves d'avenir, ses amis d'enfance. Tous ces éléments le liaient à cette ville. 
Il pensait qu'il continuerait "juste" à vivre jusqu'à la fin, jusqu'à ce qu'il la rencontre. 
Y a-t-il de l'espoir dans la vie ? Y a-t-il de la lumière dans l'avenir ? 
C'est le début d'une série de rencontres entre garçons et filles qui reflète le présent!
description.ru: В пустом городке, в разгаре своей повседневной жизни, казалось бы, "просто" жил старшеклассник Рэйдзи Куросе. Семья, мечты о будущем, друзья детства - все это привязывало его к своему родному городу. Он думал, что будет продолжать так жить и никогда ничего не изменит. Пока он не встретил ту самую. Есть ли надежда в жизни? Есть ли впереди свет? Это начало серии "мальчик, повстречавший девочку", которая отражает "сейчас".
description.tr: Reiji Kurose, hiçbir şeyin olmadığı ve görünüşe bakılırsa hiçbir değişimin de olmayacağı bir kasabada ot gibi yaşıyordu. Ailesi, gelecek hayalleri ve çocukluk arkadaşları... Hepsi onu o şehre zincirliyordu. Kendince böyle yaşar giderim diyordu. Taa ki onunla tanışıncaya dek. Yaşamanın bir manası var mı? Beni bekleyen bir gelecek var mı? Oğlan ve kızın tanışmasıyla trajedi kapıları aralanır...
description.vi: Một bộ truyện đầy u ám cùng tác giả với Hatsukoi Zombie. Trong một thị trấn nhàm chán và ngày qua ngày không có gì thay đổi, Reiji Kurose, một học sinh trung học vốn luôn "sống" như "đã chết". Gia đình, tương lai, bạn thời thơ ấu. Tất cả đều trói buộc cậu vào thị trấn này. Cậu luôn nghĩ bản thân đã "chết" cho đến khi gặp được cô gái ấy. Hy vọng nào thắp sáng cho cuộc đời tăm tối của hai người? câu chuyện về hành trình tìm đến "cái chết" để được "sống" chính thức bắt đầu.

title.en: My Sister's Best Friend, My Lover.

altTitles.ja: Ane no Shinyuu, Watashi no Koibito.

description.en: Sena is a novelist who has been dealing with romantic feelings for her sister, Yuuna. Upon learning that Yuuna is to be married, Yuuna's best friend and former lover Kiku asks Sena to be her lover...

High school student Ooishi Kyou is afraid of women.

Suddenly, five girls confessed to him. Among them, four are creatures called Koibami - beings that devour human romantic feelings. If he has his romantic feelings eaten by these girls, he will never be able to love again.

However, he cannot abandon the feelings of the one who confessed to him for real - Kyou decides to find the one he truly loves among the five! A brain-shaking, romantic comedy suspense begins!

When ten criminal acts collide, what's going to happen!?  
  
From the creator of Danshi Koukousei no Nichijou.

description.pt-br:
Odette é uma psiquiatra que transmigrou para os tempos medievais. Para voltar aos tempos modernos, ela precisava ajudar Rion, um rei com múltiplas personalidades, condição causada por seu trauma mental depois que ele decapitou sua própria esposa. 

Odette é cercada então pelo  caos, a bobagem e a loucura enquanto ela lida com as personalidades divididas em constante mudança de Rion.

altTitles.ja: モデルちゃんと地味マネさん

description.en: A cool model and a manager’s romantic comedy begins!

altTitles.ja: とある魔術の禁書目録

description.ar:
تدور أحداث القصة في عالم حيث توجد قوى خارقة للطبيعة من العلم، ويوجد السحر من الدين  
  
في القصة، توما كاميجو هو طالب عادي في الثانوية بدرجات دراسية فظيعة وقوة تسمى كاسرة الأوهام. يمكن لـ كاسرة الأوهام إبطال أي قوة أخرى، لكنها تقوض أيضًا حظ كاميجو الجيد.   
.إن قوة كاسرة الأوهام الهائلة لا تُوصف حرفياً، لذا فإن كاميجو المسكين مصنّف في المستوى من ذوي المستوى صفر  
يصادف أنه قابل فتاة برداء أبيض تتدلى من شرفة نافذته. تقول الفتاة أن السَّحرةَ يطاردونها، ويكتشف كاميجو أن الفتاة هي راهبة في كنيسة إنجلترا التي استبدلت ذكرياتها بالقُوَّةِ ليتصبح "فهرس الكتُب المحرّمة" الـ .103,000 للكنيسة
description.en:
The story is set in a world where supernatural powers exist through science, and magic exists through religion.  
  
In the story, Touma Kamijou is an ordinary high school boy with terrible academic scores and a power called Imagine Breaker. Imagine Breaker can defeat any other power, but it also undermines Kamijou's own good luck. His Imagine Breaker's immense strength is literally immeasurable, so hapless Kamijou is listed at the supernatural level of 0. He happens to meet a girl in white hanging off his window balcony. The girl says she is being chased by sorcerers, and Kamijou learns that the girl is a Church of England nun whose memories have been forcibly replaced by Index-Librorum-Prohibitorum — the 103,000 forbidden texts of the Church.
description.ru:
Действие разворачивается в параллельном мире, где наука сплавлена с магией, и сверхъестественные способности давно никого не удивляют. Их носители делятся на две категории: эсперов, которые в результате направленной мутации получили один, пусть и мощный дар, и магов, которые могут быть слабее, но диапазон возможностей у них куда шире. Юных эсперов со всей Японии собирают в единый образовательный центр – город под названием Академия. Там и учится главный герой сериала Камидзё Тома. Дар у парня весьма странный: его правая рука – универсальный негатор, то есть, обнуляет любое парафизическое, магическое или божественное воздействие. А раз так, считает Тома, то и немногие крупицы счастья, посылаемые судьбой, до него просто не доходят, и вся его жизнь – полная невезуха (его любимая фраза). То на телефон наступит, то не с теми парнями свяжется, то обнаружит на перилах собственного балкона на редкость милое и голодное юное создание в костюме монашки…  
  
Адаптация ранобэ Toaru Majutsu no Index от Камати Кадзумы.|
description.pt-br: A história se passa em uma cidade acadêmica tecnologicamente avançada localizada na região oeste de Tóquio, onde alunos cientificamente avançados chamados "espers" estudam e desenvolvem habilidades especiais cuja fonte é a mente humana. Touma Kamijou é um estudante da Academia da Cidade cuja habilidade, a Imagine Breaker, possui o poder de anular quaisquer outros poderes usando sua mão direita, mas esse poder faz com que sua sorte também seja anulada, fazendo com que seja alvo de diversas furadas e problemas de azar. Um dia ele encontra uma jovem pendurada na grade de sua varanda...

altTitles.ja: ふしぎねこのきゅーちゃん

description.en:
There’s more to this kitty than meets the eye! Kyuu-chan loves snacks, cuddles, and bow ties, but most of all loves Hinata, the young professional who adopted this mischievous wonder cat into his home.

As the two adjust to life together, they discover that they have a lot to learn from each other.

The ordinary and the extraordinary live side by side in this delightful slice-of-life manga!

---

- **[Official English license announcement](https://sevenseasentertainment.com/2020/08/28/seven-seas-isnt-kitten-around-with-license-of-wondercat-kyuu-chan-manga-series/)**

- **[ManiManiTV YouTube channel](https://www.youtube.com/c/ManiManiTV/videos/), Official Kyuu-chan motion comic videos:** [#1,](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zCBZUbEbI-w) [#2,](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wSJURvGO494) [#3](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ytJbXHsqikw)…
description.ro: O manga adorabilă color despre un tânăr ce salvează o pisică foarte specială. Dar pisica asta nu e ceea ce pare! Kyuu-chan iubeste mâncarea, îmbrățișările și fundele, dar cel mai mult, îl iubește pe Hinata, tânărul care l-a adoptat. Pe măsură ce se obișnuiesc să trăiască împreună, ei descoperă că au mult de învățat unul de la celălalt. Vedeți viața ordinară și extraordinară pe care cei doi o trăiesc în această minunată slice-of-life manga pentru toți iubitorii de animale și nu numai!
description.ru: Милая история о повседневной жизни бездомного котика Кю и человека, который решает его приютить.
description.pt-br: Hinata é um jovem trabalhador que leva uma vida mundana. No meio de uma tempestade de neve, ele acha um gato abandonado passando frio em uma caixa de papelão, e decide o levar pra casa. O que Hinata não sabia é que ele tinha acabado de pegar o melhor gato de todos!

altTitles.en: Top boys & Queen bee & KITAZAWA in A-class!!

description.en:
Masashi Kitazawa, high school 2nd-year, has a trauma: he was fat when he was a kid!

Kitazawa, who diligently dieted and worked hard in middle school, grew up to be a handsome man and was supposed to lead a peaceful school life, but... In the new semester of high school, handsome men and beautiful girls have gathered in Kitazawa's 2nd year class A for some reason. What's more, he received a secret invitation from Ayame Yagyu, the most beautiful girl in her grade...!?
description.es-la: Kitazawa Masashi es parte de los 3 chicos más aputos de la preparatoria Nishiki pero oculta un pasado que no le quiere revelar a nadie, hasta que su compañera Yagyu Ayame lo descubre y le cuenta el secreto que ella también guarda, ahora serán cómplices en guardar el secreto del otro, mientras Kitazawa trata de mantener su estatus de "chico popular"...

description.en: A mystery murder case shatters Lan Zhiqing's serene and blissful life into pieces. The past she has long forgotten returns in the form of a nightmarish case, encroaching ever the closer... Shocked, Lan Zhiqing discovers that the most dangerous existence may just be the person she shares a bed with.

altTitles.en: Tsumiki Ogami & the Strange Everyday Life.

altTitles.es: Tsumiki Omori y la extraña vida cotidiana.

altTitles.es-la: Tsumiki Omori y la extraña vida cotidiana.

altTitles.pt-br: Tsumiki Ogami e seu estranho coditiano.

altTitles.vi: Tsumiki Ogami Và Cuộc Sống DIệu Kỳ

altTitles.ru: Цумики Огами и странная повседневная жизнь

altTitles.fr: Ogami Tsumiki et l'étrange vie du quotidien

altTitles.vi: Tsumiki Ogami và Cuộc sống diệu kì!

description.en:
Today, we live in an age of diversity. The phrase "non-humans" is a thing of the past. "Genjin" live their lives interacting with human beings.

One human boy, Yutaka Shinsou, is troubled. He is so used to being in tune with his surroundings that he no longer understands his own feelings. At Keiki High School, where many "Genjin" attend, he meets Tsumiki Ogami, a werewolf. She is cute, powerful, a little out of the ordinary, and kind.

When he spends time with her, Yutaka's heart is somehow noisier than usual. Spinning an "unusual" everyday life with Tsumiki the werewolf.

The new normal graph of youth is about to begin.
description.es: Hoy vivimos en la era de la diversidad. La expresión "no humanos" es cosa del pasado. Los "genjin" viven sus vidas interactuando con los seres humanos. Un chico humano, Yutaka Shinsou, tiene problemas. Está tan acostumbrado a estar en sintonía con su entorno que ya no comprende sus propios sentimientos. En el instituto Keiki, al que acuden muchos "genjin", conoce a Tsumiki Ogami, una mujer lobo. Es guapa, poderosa, un poco fuera de lo común y amable... Cuando pasa tiempo con ella, el corazón de Yutaka hace más ruido de lo normal. Hilando una "inusual" vida cotidiana con Tsumiki, la mujer lobo. El nuevo gráfico normal de la juventud está a punto de comenzar.
description.fr:
Aujourd'hui, nous vivons à l'ère de la diversité. L'expression « non-humains » appartient au passé. Les « Genjin » vivent leur vie en interaction avec les êtres humains.

Un garçon humain, Yutaka Shinsou, est troublé. Il est tellement habitué à être en phase avec son environnement qu'il ne comprend plus ses propres sentiments. Au lycée Keiki, que fréquentent de nombreux « Genjin », il rencontre Tsumiki Ogami, un loup-garou. Elle est mignonne, puissante, un peu hors du commun et gentille.

Lorsqu'il passe du temps avec elle, le cœur de Yutaka est plus bruyant que d'habitude. Une vie quotidienne « inhabituelle » avec Tsumiki le loup-garou.

Le nouveau parcours normal de la jeunesse est sur le point de commencer.
description.ja:
ウェアウルフの尾守つみきさんと紡ぐ、「普通」じゃない日常――

多様性の時代とされる現代。ついこの間まで「人ならざる存在」だった「幻人」は今は人間と関わり合って生活しています。

舞台は、幻人が多く通う景希高校。そこにいたのは、ウェアウルフの尾守つみき（おがみつみき）さん。モフモフの耳と尻尾が揺れる、天真爛漫な美少女。

真層友孝（しんそうゆたか）くんは、悩める人間の少年。人間関係が原因で、自分のことが分からなくなりました。友孝くんはつみきさんと出会い、自分の「気持ち」を見つけていきます。

「…人間って大変だぁ～」
日常が変わっていく、つみきさんと一緒なら。

まだ誰も知らない、ニューノーマルな青春がここに。
description.pl:
Obecnie żyjemy w erze różnorodności. Wyrażenie „nie-ludzie” należy już do przeszłości. „Genjin” żyją w interakcji z ludźmi.

Pewien ludzki chłopiec, Yutaka Shinsou, jest zaniepokojony. Jest tak przyzwyczajony do bycia w zgodzie z otoczeniem, że nie rozumie już własnych uczuć. W Liceum Keiki, gdzie uczęszcza wielu „Genjin”, spotyka Tsumiki Ogami, wilkołaka. Jest urocza, potężna, trochę nietypowa i miła.

Kiedy spędza z nią czas, serce Yutaki staje się głośniejsze niż zwykle. Niezwykłe niecodzienne życie z wilkołakiem Tsumiki.
description.ru: Сегодня мы живём в эпоху культурного разнообразия. "Нелюди" постепенно ушли из словесного оборота. "Гендзины" живут своей жизнью, взаимодействуя с людьми. Один из человеческих мальчиков, Ютака Шинсо, кое-чем обеспокоен. Он настолько привык быть в гармонии со своим окружением, что перестал понимать свои собственные чувства. В средней школе Кэйки, где учатся многие "гендзины", он знакомится с оборотнем Цумики Огами. Она милая, сильная, немного странная и добрая... Когда Ютака проводит с ней время, его сердце почему-то бьется чаще обычного.
description.es-la: Hoy vivimos en la era de la diversidad. La expresión "no humanos" es cosa del pasado. Los "genjin" viven sus vidas interactuando con los seres humanos. Un chico humano, Yutaka Shinsou, tiene problemas. Está tan acostumbrado a estar en sintonía con su entorno que ya no comprende sus propios sentimientos. En el instituto Keiki, al que acuden muchos "genjin", conoce a Tsumiki Ogami, una mujer lobo. Es guapa, poderosa, un poco fuera de lo común y amable... Cuando pasa tiempo con ella, el corazón de Yutaka hace más ruido de lo normal. Hilando una "inusual" vida cotidiana con Tsumiki, la mujer lobo. El nuevo gráfico normal de la juventud está a punto de comenzar.

description.en: After leaving a scar on his best friend's face years ago, Tsubaki feels responsible and is determined to grow up big and strong so he can protect Yuu. Yuu is already in high school and Tsubaki is only in elementary, but he is sure that his feelings will get through and Yuu will eventually come to rely on him.

altTitles.ja: 理解のあるカレンちゃん

description.en:
“You’re amazing for being alive another day!”

A Manga about an understanding girlfriend who rewards you with a “log-in bonus” every day.

At a certain prison under the surface, the "bottom of the bottom" that is the Teiai Underground Labor Facility, there is a man who uses his "one-day outing passes" to go above ground and enjoy all the luxuries of life while living in the poor conditions of the underground. His name is Ootsuki, and he is the leader of Squad E and a master of enjoying himself all day long with eating, drinking, and having a great time.

La extraña aventura de JoJo Parte 7: La carrera de las bolas de acero

description.en:
In the American Old West, the world's greatest race is about to begin. Thousands line up in San Diego to travel over six thousand kilometers for a chance to win the grand prize of fifty million dollars. With the era of the horse reaching its end, contestants are allowed to use any kind of vehicle they wish. Competitors will have to endure grueling conditions, traveling up to a hundred kilometers a day through uncharted wastelands. The Steel Ball Run is truly a one-of-a-kind event.  
  
The youthful Johnny Joestar, a crippled former horse racer, has come to San Diego to watch the start of the race. There he encounters Gyro Zeppeli, a racer with two steel balls at his waist instead of a gun. Johnny witnesses Gyro using one of his steel balls to unleash a fantastical power, compelling a man to fire his gun at himself during a duel. In the midst of the action, Johnny happens to touch the steel ball and feels a power surging through his legs, allowing him to stand up for the first time in two years. Vowing to find the secret of the steel balls, Johnny decides to compete in the race, and so begins his bizarre adventure across America on the Steel Ball Run.
description.hu:
Amerikában a régi vadnyugaton, a világ legnagyobb szabású versenye hamarosan kezdődik. Ezrek állnak rajzvonalhoz San Diegoban, hogy utazzanak több mint hat ezer kilómétert annak reményében, hogy megnyerhetik az ötven millió dolláros fődíjat. A lovak kora elérkezett a végéhez, így a versenyzők szabadon használhattak bármiféle járművet. A versenyzőknek el kell majd tűrniük a fárasztő körülményeket, naponta több mint, száz kilómétert megtéve felfedezetlen vidékeken. A Steel Ball Run egy igazán egyedülálló esemény.

A fiatalos Johnny Joestar, egy tolószékes korábbi lovas versenyző, eljött San Diegoba, hogy megnézze a verseny rajtját. Itt találkozik Gyro Zeppelivel, egy versenyzővel két acél golyóval a derekán fegyver helyett. Johnny szemtanúja lesz annak, hogy Gyro használja az egyik acélgolyóját, szabadjára engedve annak erejét, hogy arra kényszerítsen egy férfit egy párbaj közben, hogy lőjje le magát. Az ütközet közepette, Johnny megérinti az
acélgolyót és érezte, hogy egy erő végigáramlik a lábán, rábírva őt arra, hogy felálljon először két év után. Megfogadja, hogy rájön, hogy mi a titka az acélgolyóknak, Johnny eldönti, hogy indul a versenyen, így kezdődik el az ő bizarr kalandja Amerikán keresztül a Steel Ball Runban.
description.uk: Вересень 1980. Дикий Захід. Америка. Жокеї зі всього світу чекають гонку "Сталева Куля", яка ось-ось розпочнеться. Тисячі людей вишиковуються в Сан-Дієго, щоб подолати понад шість тисяч кілометрів заради шансу отримати головний приз — п’ятдесят мільйонів доларів. Юний Джонні Джостар, каліка, колишній жокей та популярний скакун, приїхав до Сан-Дієґо, щоб подивитися на старт перегонів. Там він зустрічає Джайро Цеппелі, гонщика з двома сталевими кулями на талії замість револьвера, звичної зброї для жителів. Джонні бачить, як Джайро використовує одну зі своїх сталевих куль, змушуючи людину вистрілити з рушниці в себе під час дуелі. Поклявшись знайти таємницю сталевих куль, Джонні вирішує взяти участь у гонці. Так і починається його химерна пригода.
description.pt-br: Nos Estados Unidos, na década de 1890, um homem chamado Steven Steel decide promover a "Steel Ball Run", uma corrida corta-mato cujo trajeto atravessa todo o país. A corrida é um grande atrativo mundial que chama a atenção tanto de corredores americanos como de corredores estrangeiros. Entre esses corredores estão Johnny Joestar, um ex-jóquei americano, e Gyro Zeppeli, um estrangeiro que carrega consigo misteriosas esferas de aço. Johnny e Gyro se esbarram e dão início à história da sétima parte de JoJo's Bizarre Adventure.

description.en:
Daily Chaldea is an unofficial daily slice-of-life fancomic created using art assets from the game Fate/Grand Order and building upon the existing lore of the franchise.

The story follows the adventures of genderswapping protagonist Ritsuka Fujimaru and the many Servants they've summoned, with the tone ranging from comedic to philosophical. The comic is 'live' with the NA server of Fate/Grand Order, with new characters appearing in the comic around the time they appear in the game and comics often referencing recent events in the game.

Enjoyment of this comic relies heavily upon the reader's familiarity with the game and its characters, so the author recommends playing Fate/Grand Order before reading this comic.

---

This comic is being uploaded to MangaDex by reader request and with the approval of MangaDex staff. All art is copyright TYPE-Moon / FGO Project, Aniplex Inc., Lasengle, and other copyright holders as appropriate. This comic is not for profit (through ad revenue or otherwise).

Some early use the original white backgrounds. Later comics have darker backgrounds and additional art assets for improved quality.

title.en: NEET dakedo Hello Work ni Ittara Isekai ni Tsuretekareta

altTitles.en: I'm a NEET but when I went to Hello Work I got taken to another world

altTitles.ru: Я NEET, но когда пошёл устраиваться на работу, попал в иной мир

altTitles.ja: ニートだけどハロワにいったら異世界につれてかれた

altTitles.zh: 尼特族的异世界就职记

description.en:
The 23-year-old NEET Masaru Yamano went to Hello Work and found an interesting job offer. 
 
_"A sword and sorcery fantasy, playtest for Miniature Garden of Razgrad World. Extended period of time, preferred to be able to live on-site. Monthly salary of 250,000+ yen."_ 
 
He immediately goes to the interview and signs a contract. However, the place of employment is another world. Because of the contract, he’s taken there. To survive, Masaru receives a cheat, but he is told the shocking truth: the world will be destroyed in 20 years! Can a simple NEET prevent the destruction of the world?!
description.ru:
23-летний безработный Ямано Масару отправился в Hello Work и нашёл интересное предложение работы.  
«Тестовая игра в маленьком саду «Мир Разград». Срок работы длительный, с проживанием на рабочем месте. Оплата: 250 000 иен + комиссия.»  
Пройдя собеседование и подписав договор, Масару попадает на место своей новой работы — другой мир! Согласно договору, Масару получил особую способность, а вскоре узнал шокирующую правду: «этот мир будет уничтожен через 20 лет». Сможет ли простой безработный предотвратить разрушение мира?!

altTitles.es-la: El camino a casa después de la escuela

altTitles.pt-br: Viagem para casa depois da escola

description.en: Shun was invited to the Going-Home Club by Naoki Satou, also known as "Chokki-chan". Despite refusing, he ends up being somewhat forcefully involved in the club's activities! A Going Home Club rom-com featuring a detour-loving high school girl and a new high school student who has lost his dream.
description.ja:
佐藤直希こと“直帰ちゃん”から帰宅部に勧誘された瞬。断ったのに、半ば強引な形で活動に参加させられるハメに！ 寄り道大好き女子高生と夢を失った新入生が紡ぐ帰宅部ラブコメディ！

---

Satō Naoki koto “chokki-chan” kara kitaku-bu ni kan'yū sa reta Shun. Kotowatta no ni, nakaba gōin'na katachi de katsudō ni sanka sa se rareru hame ni! Yorimichi daisuki mesukōsei to yume o ushinatta shin'nyūsei ga tsumugu kitaku-bu rabukomedi!
description.es-la: Shun fue invitado al Club de Irse a Casa por Naoki Satou, también conocida como "Chokki-chan". A pesar de negarse, acaba involucrándose a la fuerza en las actividades del club. Una comedia romántica del Club de Irse a Casa protagonizada por una chica de preparatoria amante de los desvíos y un nuevo estudiante de preparatoria que ha perdido su sueño.

description.en: Yonghak ultimately failed to save the world despite repeated regressions. At the next regression, he decides to quit being a savior. But suddenly, disciples show up, one by one... Will the world be kept safe?! Will the savior be able to fulfill his bucket list of wishes for rest?!
description.ko:
반복되는 회귀에도 결국 세상을 구원하지 못한 용학 
다음 회귀에 이르러 구원자를 그만두기로 한다. 
그런데 하나둘 제자가 생기고… 세상이 자꾸만 구원되기 시작한다?! 
과연 구원자는 쉬고 싶어 하는 자신의 버킷리스트를 이룰 수 있을까?

description.en: A 34-year-old NEET gets killed in a traffic accident and finds himself in a world of magic. Rather than waking up as a full-grown mage, he gets reincarnated as a newborn baby, retaining the memories of his past life. Before he can even properly move his body, he resolves to never make the same mistakes he made in his first life ever again and instead live a life with no regrets with the new one that was given to him. Because he has the knowledge of a middle-aged man, by the age of two, he has already become a prodigy and possesses power unthinkable for anyone his age and even older. Thus begins the chronicles of Rudeus Greyrat, son of swordsman Paul and healer Zenith, as he enters a new world to become the strongest mage known to man, with powers rivaling even the gods themselves.
description.ru:
34-летнего отаку-затворника выгнали из дома родственники после похорон его родителей. Этот жирный и уродливый девственник без гроша в кармане осознал, что его жизнь подошла к концу. Затем он понял, что его жизнь вообще могла бы быть намного лучше, если бы тот мог избавиться от тёмных страниц своей жизни. Пребывая в сожалениях, мужчина увидел, как грузовик со спящим водителем быстро надвигается на трёх школьников. Собрав все свои силы, он попытался спасти их и погиб.  
  
А открыв глаза, он обнаружил, что переродился в мире меча и магии как Рудеус Грейрат. Получив в этом мире новую жизнь, Рудеус решил, что в этот раз проживёт свою жизнь на полную, безо всяких сожалений!  
  
И так началось приключение человека, пожелавшего заново начать свою жизнь.  
  
Alternative Raw: <http://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/23831>
description.es-la: La historia trata sobre un muchacho que se encierra en su casa tras sufrir una enorme humillación pública sin atreverse a salir durante varios años debido a los traumas que esto le ocasionó. Incapaz de soportar esto, se encerró en casa sin querer salir ni volver a ver a sus compañeros y durante años el miedo a salir creció y creció, acabando por convertirse en una carga para su familia… hasta el día en que sus padres murieron y sus hermanos lo expulsaron de su hogar por el parásito en el que se había convertido. En ese momento, aunque tarde, se arrepintió de su actitud y se puso a pensar que su vida podría haber sido decente si él le hubiera puesto más esfuerzo. Justo cuando estaba a punto de iniciar su nuevo cambio, ve un camión en movimiento a gran velocidad dirigiéndose a tres estudiantes de secundaria. Reuniendo todas las fuerzas que tenía logra salvarlos, pero a cambio él termina siendo atropellado por el camión, muriendo al instante. Cuando abrió los ojos, él había reencarnado en un mundo de espadas y magia como Rudeus Greyrat. Nacido en este nuevo mundo, con una nueva vida, Rudeus decidió que, “Esta vez, realmente voy a vivir mi vida al máximo sin arrepentimientos”. De este modo se inicia el viaje de un hombre que anhela reiniciar su vida.

title.en: Isekai Furin ll ~Michibika Reshi Hitodzuma Tachi to Bukiyo Tensei Yuusha~

altTitles.ja: 異世界不倫Ⅱ～導かれし人妻たちと不器用転生勇者～

description.en:
An office worker, Yuuto Aida, witnesses his wife's affair at home!  When he jumps out of the house, he gets hit by a truck and is reincarnated in another world as a hero!!  However, due to the misunderstanding about Goddess Reincarnation, he only had one skill, it was a skill that could captivate other people's wives!!

(MTL)
description.id: Suami sibuk bekerja Istri sibuk selingkuh, Seorang pekerja kantoran, Yuuto Aida, menyaksikan perselingkuhan istrinya di rumahnya! Ketika dia melompat keluar rumah, dia ditabrak truk dan bereinkarnasi di dunia lain sebagai pahlawan!! Namun, karena kesalahpahaman tentang Reinkarnasi Dewi, dia hanya punya satu skill, itu adalah skill yang dapat memikat istri orang lain!!
description.ja: ごくごく普通のサラリーマン・愛田勇人（あいだ　ゆうと）は、自宅で妻の浮気現場を目撃！家を飛び出したところ、“例のトラック”に轢かれ──勇者として異世界転生することに！！しかし、転生の女神のひょんな勘違いから、たったひとつのスキルだけを彼は手に入れることになった──　それは、“人妻完全魅了（チャーム）”というスキル！世の人妻は皆すべて、彼に魅了される！！！！

description.en:
The world is plunged into an icy age, and 95% of humanity is wiped out! In his previous life, our hero Zhang Yi was tragically killed by the very people he helped, thanks to his kind heart.

But fear not, for Zhang Yi has been reborn and now possesses the awesome power – space manipulation! He's gone completely bonkers hoarding supplies for the icy apocalypse and is ready to rule the frozen wasteland! He vows to unleash a hundred times the pain on those who harmed him in the past!
A spin-off of Sakigake!! Otokojuku focusing on Date Omito.

title.en: Duke Pendragon: Master of the White Dragon

altTitles.ja: 白龍公爵ペンドラゴン

altTitles.es-la: El Duque del dragón blanco: Pendragon

description.en:
Born as the successor of a low-ranking noble household, Raven Varte wears the sin of plotting a rebellion against the empire. To be granted amnesty, he was sent to fight demons alongside the worst corp of the empire, the ”Demon” corp. Most say that it is a place where most won’t survive for even a year, but Raven somehow managed to survive for ten. When his amnesty was in front of his eyes, on his last battlefield, he met the ‘Successor of the Pendragon Duke Household, Eren Pendragon.

---
- [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iRX266roHHM)

---
- [Official Korean Translation](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=58558135)
description.ja:
下級貴族の次男として生まれたレイヴン・ヴァルトは反逆の汚名を着せられ、 赦免を見返りに最悪の部隊である"羅刹隊”で魔物と戦うことに。 大半は1年も生きることができないと言われる場所で、レイヴンは10年の歳月を生き延びた。 赦免を目前に控えたある日、最後の戦場でペンドラゴン公爵家の後継者であるエレン・ペンドラゴンと共に任務にあたるが…

---
- [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iRX266roHHM)

---
- [Official Korean Translation](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=58558135)
description.ko:
하급 귀족 가문의 차남으로 태어난 레이븐 발트.
반역에 연루되어 홀로 살아남은 그는
사면을 대가로 ‘악귀 부대’에서 싸우게 된다.

대부분이 1년을 버티지 못하는 곳에서
10년의 사면기간을 채울 때까지 살아남은 레이븐 발트.

사면을 목전에 둔 어느 날,
어려운 임무를 받고 팬드래건 공작가문의 후계자인
엘렌 팬드래건과 함께 임무에 투입되는데….

---
- [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iRX266roHHM)

---
- [Official Korean Translation](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=58558135)
description.ru:
Рэйвен Вальте, наследник малоизвестной аристократической семьи, обвиняется в бунтовщичестве против империи. У него есть выбор - ссылка, или смерть, и он выбирает ссылку. Его наказание - служба в войсках истребителей демонов, худшем военном подразделении в империи. Никто не верит, что Рейвен способен выжить там хотя бы год, но он приспосабливается и выживает до конца срока в десять лет. За несколько дней до амнистии он встречает на поле боя герцога Пендрагона, и происходит невероятное. 

---
- [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iRX266roHHM)

---
- [Official Korean Translation](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=58558135)

description.en: Yataro Araki, a member of the Tojo High School soccer team, has big dreams. Within a decade, he sees himself conquering the soccer world’s loftiest peak: European “football!” Fast forward to what may be his last soccer match before graduation, the match that will make or break his dreams. Having thus far failed to attract the attention of scouts, he is now desperate to do whatever it takes to prove himself. Yataro is prepared to get his hands dirty if it means winning. If it means standing at the top! Welcome to the world of international football! Nothing is sacred, no rule is left unbroken! Not when victory is on the line!
description.ja: 東條高校サッカー部に所属する嵐木八咫郎（あらきやたろう）の夢は欧州を制覇し、世界一になること。 高校3年の最後の試合、夢への第1歩、プロ入りを目指しスカウトの目に留まるため奮闘をするが―…。
description.vi: Yataro Araki là thành viên clb bóng đá trường cao trung Tojo. Cậu có ước mơ chinh phục đỉnh cao bóng đá Châu Âu trong 10 năm tới. Thời gian trôi qua, vào trận cuối cùng trước khi tốt nghiệp, và cũng là trận sẽ quyết định giấc mơ của cậu. Mọi thứ sẽ vô nghĩa nếu Araki không được tuyển trạch viên nào để ý đến, vì vậy cậu sẵn lòng làm tất cả mọi thứ, kể cả khi phải chơi bẩn để giành lấy chiến thắng. Nếu nó giúp cậu vươn đến đỉnh cao! Chào mừng đến với giới bóng đá quốc tế! Không tồn tại thứ gọi là bất khả xâm phạm hay luật lệ! Ít nhất là khi chiến thắng đang cận kề!

description.en:
Is being unable to see the red string of fate better?!  
Since the encounter on the day of the high school entrance ceremony, dog-like boy, Makita Keita and cat-like girl, Ohara Tamaki have had the worst relationship.  
The story starts to progress when the both of them are put in the same class.  
A little mysterious heart racing school youth graffiti begins!
description.es: El timido y amigable Keita trata de mejorar su amistad con Tamaki, que siempre se ha mostrado fria y cruel desde la primera vez que se conocieron. ¿Pero por qué? Keita quiere saber… ¿Será que lo odia? ¿Hizo algo que la lastimó? Eso pensaba Keita, hasta que Tamaki le dijo que podia ver algo especial…

altTitles.en: May You Reach a Sacred Place
May the Holy One Come Early

description.en:
On the order of the High Priest, the holy kingdom’s inquisitor, “McClat” captures the wicked great witch, ‘Vienny’. Vienny, on the other hand, promises him she would assist him in his quest for the other witches. Although Vienny appears to be terrified in his presence, she is unconcerned about the witches' cleansing. McClat's sentiments and ideas get increasingly muddled with her presence...

**Note:** *The webtoon released as R15; it's not R19 like the novel.*

altTitles.ja-ro: At the North Fort, Happy Days That I Spent With Everyone!

altTitles.id: Nama TerkaitDi Benteng Utara, Hari-hari Bahagia yang Aku Habiskan Bersama Semua Orang!

description.en:
Paw pads wrapped in white fur. Fluffiness around the neck. 
A bushy tail. A rounded figure that was the very definition of fur ball! 
A certain Japanese girl had been reincarnated into such a fox cub, Milfiria.
Milfiria was told to watch the house by her mother, as she left for the capital. 
However, unable to bear with the loneliness, she decided to follow her mother
but lost her way until she reached a fort protected by strong knights.

A Twitter series about a handsome salaryman and an unapproachable office lady who dress completely different when they are off work.

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/user/4729811/series/198059)
description.es-la: Los colegas con diferentes personalidades tienen una vida privada donde uno se viste como una lolita y el otro se viste como una persona funky goath.

description.en:
"Is this how it feels to have a friend?" 

Bibi is obsessed with Peter, the prince of the school. When she spots Amy next to him, she starts to feel jealous. She invites Amy to her house to warn her, but instead takes a liking to the girl. They agree to be friends on the condition that Amy has to help Bibi confess.
description.fr:
"C'est ce qu'on ressent lorsqu'on a une amie ?"
Bibi est obsédée par Peter, le prince de l'école. Lorsqu'elle repère Amy près de lui, elle commence à être jalouse. Elle invite Amy chez elle pour la prévenir, mais à la place, elle commence à apprécier cette fille. Elles acceptent d'être amies à la condition que Amy doive aider Bibi à se déclarer.
description.ko:
"원래 친구 사이엔 이런 기분이 드는 걸까?"

'비비'는 학교 제일의 킹카 피터에게 집착하다, 그의 곁에 있던 '에이미'를 보고 질투를 느낀다. 그녀에게 경고하기 위해서 자신의 집에 초대했지만 오히려 호감을 느끼게 되고...
둘은 비비의 고백을 돕는다는 조건으로 서로에게 유일한 친구가 되기로 한다.
description.ru:
"Вот что значит быть друзьями?" Биби одержима Питэром, принцем школы.
Когда она замечает Эми рядом с ним, она начинает ревновать. Она приглашает Эми к себе, чтобы предупредить. Но вместо этого Эми нравится ей. Они соглашаются быть друзьями, но при одном условии: Эми должна помочь Биби признаться в любви.

description.en: I treated you like a brother, but you treated me like a love rival! You stole every girlfriend I ever had! I just wanted to get married and have a baby, why is that so difficult?! A black-hearted white lotus vs. straight guy. A wild omegaverse fantasy,  that's both sweet and seductive~~

title.en: Grandmaster of Demonic Cultivation - Mo Dao Zu Shi

altTitles.pt-br: Mo Dao Zu Shi - O Fundador da Cultivação Demoníaca

description.en:
As the grandmaster who founded the Demonic Sect, Wei WuXian roamed the world in his wanton ways, hated by millions for the chaos he created. In the end, he was back-stabbed by his dearest junior brother and killed by powerful clans that combined to overpower him. He incarnates into the body of a lunatic who was abandoned by his clan and is later, unwillingly, taken away by a famous cultivator among the clans—Lan WangJi, his archenemy.  
  
This marks the start of a thrilling yet hilarious journey of attacking monsters, solving mysteries, and raising children. From the mutual flirtation along the way, Wei WuXian slowly realizes that Lan WangJi, a seemingly haughty and indifferent poker-face, holds more feelings for Wei WuXian than he is letting on.
description.pl:
Wei Wuxian, założyciel demonicznej sekty, przemierzał świat w swój rozpustny sposób, znienawidzony przez miliony za chaos, który wywołał. Ostatecznie został zdradzony przez swojego najdroższego shidi i zamordowany przez potężne klany, które złączyły siły, by go pokonać. Po kilkunastu latach ocknął się w ciele szaleńca, który został porzucony przez rodzinę. Niedługo później siłą zostaje przygarnięty przez Lan Wangji, jego arcywroga. Tak rozpoczyna się trzymająca w napięciu i wywołująca śmiech wędrówka złożona z pokonywania potworów i rozwiązywania tajemnic. I kto im zabroni trochę poflirtować po drodze?  
  
[Tłumaczenie powieści](https://dracaena.webd.pl/portfolio/mo-dao-zu-shi/)

A Useless Idol and the Only Fan in the World

description.en:
"Urumin" is an idol, but she can't sing or dance well, and she's got a dishonest character. Kimiya is the only fan in the world who likes her. The relationship between the two of them is a little different from the usual relationships between idols and fans! 

This is a "precious" love comedy that depicts the daily life of a bad idol and the man who keeps on promoting her, and the way he loves her!
description.ja: "うるみん"はアイドルなのに歌も踊りもダメダメで性格も素直じゃない。そんな彼女を推している世界で一人だけのファン、キミヤ。ふたりの関係性は普通のアイドル、ファンとの関係性と違ってちょっと変！？ダメなアイドルと彼女を推し続ける男の日常を描く、愛し方がすごい「尊い」系ラブコメディ！
description.pt-br: “Urumin” é uma idol, mas ela não consegue cantar nem dançar bem e não costuma ser sincera com seus reais sentimentos. “Kimiya” é seu único fã. A relação entre eles é um pouco diferente das relações normais entre fãs e ídolos! Esta é uma comédia romântica que retrata a vida diária de uma idol completamente desajeitada e o homem que continua a apoiá-la, demonstrando seu fanatismo até nos piores momentos!

description.en: They come for three reasons: to say hello, to like you, or to harm you.
description.id: Mereka datang dengan tiga alasan, sekedar menyapamu, menyukaimu, atau ingin mencelakaimu.

description.en:
A hitman and a marriage swindler set out on the world’s most grueling battle for marriage!

Gero is a young man from a clan of hitmen, which has been in existence for hundreds of years. As someone who’s never gone to school and lived his life dealing in the dark side of the business, he considers himself to have “no prospects with women” and marriage as “something not for him.”

However, one day, in fear that their lineage would dissolve, his clan warns Gero that if he doesn’t marry and produce an heir, they would have no choice but to…force his little sister into doing “that.” Driven to his wits’ end, Gero asks the target of his work, a marriage swindler, to…

------
- [Official English Volumes at Viz Media](https://www.viz.com/marriage-toxin)
description.ja: <毎週水曜更新>殺し屋×結婚詐欺師の世界一ハードな婚活バトル物語！数百年続く殺し屋一族の青年・下呂。学校にも行かず裏稼業で生きてきた彼にとって女性は「苦手で縁遠いもの」であり、結婚は「するべきではないもの」と考えていた。だがある日、血が絶えることを恐れた彼の実家は、下呂が結婚し子供を残さないならば、妹に「それ」を強制することを通告。困り果てた下呂は仕事のターゲットであった結婚詐欺師に…。
description.pt-br:
Um assassino de aluguel e uma vigarista de casamentos partem na batalha mais cansativa do mundo! 

Gero é um jovem de um clã de assassinos, que existe há centenas de anos. Como alguém que nunca foi à escola e viveu sua vida lidando com o lado sombrio do negócio, ele se considera “sem perspectivas com mulheres” e o casamento é “algo que não é para ele”. No entanto, um dia, com medo de que sua linhagem se dissolva, seu clã avisa Gero que, se ele não se casar e ter um herdeiro, eles não terão escolha a não ser… forçar sua irmãzinha a fazer “isso”. Levado ao extremo, Gero pede ao alvo de seu trabalho, uma vigarista de casamento, para que...

altTitles.ja: だらしないです 堀田先生！

description.en: Makoto Kuribayashi is your typical high schooler with a not-so-typical after-school gig as a housekeeper. His latest client? None other than his school’s most popular teacher, the gorgeous Rumiko Hotta. But Hotta-sensei is hiding a dirty little secret: she's a total slob, the polar opposite of her flawless public image! Now, Makoto's got the unenviable task of cleaning up after her mess. Will his admiration for Hotta-sensei survive a dose of harsh reality in this irreverent comedy?

altTitles.en: I Became the Younger Sister of a Regretful Obsessive Male Lead
I Became the Younger Sister of a Regretful Obsessive Male Lead

description.en:
One day, I transmigrated to an unknown story!
 
My parents here have passed away, and it was only after being adopted by a new duke that I realized what story I transmigrated to…
 
A tragic BL webtoon where all the characters die- and at the center of it, I’m the first side character to die!
 
And on top of that, I’m destined to die by my favorite character, Lucian’s, hands?!
 
Fortunately, or unfortunately, we’re here before the start of the tragedy.
Since I’ve been adopted by the dukedom where my favorite character is, there’s still plenty of time to change the ending!
 
However…
 
I just wanted to change Lucian into a sweet guy and have a happily ever after, but why is his obsession coming towards my direction?!

Since the dawn of humanity, those who have never experienced love and meet an untimely end are granted a second chance at life as Cupids by the Goddess of Love.

Present day Cupids have traded in their bow and arrow for modern firearms, but their mission remains the same: find suitable lovers for their targets and make them fall in love!

description.en: The four-panel comedy manga's story centers on Miyako Hoshino, a shy college student and otaku. Miyako's younger sister Hinata, who is a fifth grader, has a classmate and friend named Hana. When they meet, Miyako falls for Hana at first sight.
description.es-la: La historia de este manga cómico 4-Koma se centra en Miyako Hoshino, una tímida estudiante universitaria y otaku. La hermana pequeña de Miyako, Hinata, que está en quinto grado, tiene una compañera de clase y amiga llamada Hana. Cuando se conocen, Miyako se enamora de Hana a primera vista...

description.en:
Amid the dark secrets between the House of van Dyke and the royal House of Lomanic, Escal is used by the third prince, Hazen. That’s when he finds himself being shaken up by Laranoan. With her appearance, the hidden stories begin to be revealed one by one. Bearing the same scars, the two men end up falling in love with Laranoan, who has a light that is the complete opposite to them. The crooked love bombing of the two men who are ignorant about love brings about a huge change...

---
Laranora Ador gets more than she bargained for when she rescues a young boy from being sold off in an infamous auction house. The boy is actually Eskal van Dyck, the "Crazy Marquess," in disguise! Unaware of his violent and heartless true nature, Laranora takes Eskal under her wing. Determined to raise him with utmost care and respect, Laranora grows deeply attached to Eskal... and in return, the true Eskal begins to fall in love with her. Unfortunately, Eskal is often targeted for his powerful magic and ruthless ways, which leads to a tragic event that separates the two. But Eskal is determined to find her again as his true self. Will Laranora be able to accept who he really is? And more importantly, what will happen when something fishy brewing in the Imperial Palace may involve them both?

---

description.ko:
"나를 이용해요. 그대가 날 사랑하지 않아도 되니까." 

정의로운 대장장이 가문의 영애, 라라. 
그녀는 어린 소년, 에스칼을 인신매매로부터 구해내어 함께 지내지만, 갑작스러운 영지 침략으로 인해 그를 잃고 만다. 
쉽게 아물지 않는 아픔을 억지로 묻은 채 가문의 부흥에만 힘 쓴지 1년. 라라의 앞에는 제국의 악명 높은 '미친 후작', 에스칼 반 다이크가 나타나는데... 

같은 이름, 유사한 외양, 차갑고 냉정한 성격까지. 
라라는 1년 전 죽은 소년과 자꾸만 겹쳐보이는 그의 애정공세가 혼란스럽기만 하다!

description.en: Mary Amachi is a very devout christian who transfers to the "Perfect Religion Academy", a school devoted to all religions of the world in effort to make it's students the next world leaders in religion. Her new friend Saori is kidnapped by the Black Budda cult which is a group who wishes to take away religious freedom though force and brainwashing. Mary prays to God for help but Buddha answers the call! Mary accepts only to help her friend and she is transformed into "Butt Attack Punisher Girl Gotaman". Between fighting bad guys, making a deal with Buddha, and wearing scandalous costume is it more then Mary can take?

title.en: I Hold the Heart of a Tyrant

description.en:
The Crown Prince’s only friend, me, Euseniel Heartland.

One day, our family was expelled from the capital for having had a bad influence on the Crown Prince. But after 14 years, we finally reunite, However,  he has changed drastically.

When asked why he changed, the Crown Prince answers that it is because he wanted to be the ideal man for me. But no, this is not the friend I used to know anymore, And it's not only his appearance what has changed, I'm sure there something else on the inside that's not the same as before. What could it be?

Being an Elite Nanny is simple: protect the charge, obey the principle, and don’t get emotionally attached. Easier said than done when Davina’s first client is a dangerously compelling Venetian underboss who’s determined to get under her skin. What he wants from her, she can’t imagine, but Gabriel Angelini drags her back into the glittering world of organized crime she thought she’d left behind forever. She might get answers about her past if she digs deep enough, but can she protect Mikey from his father’s ambitions and keep her heart from getting tangled up in their treacherous web?
Sequel to Kengan Asura. Takes place 2 years after the tournament.

title.en: Ore wa Shiranai Uchi ni Gakkou Ichi no Bishoujo wo Kudoite Itarashii

altTitles.en: It Seems I Was Hitting on the Most Beautiful Girl in School Without Me Noticing

altTitles.ja: 俺は知らないうちに学校一の美少女を口説いていたらしい
俺は知らないうちに学校一の美少女を口説いていたらしい ～バイト先の相談相手に俺の想い人の話をすると彼女はなぜか照れ始める～

description.en:
The protagonist begins to get involved with the most beautiful girl in school, who is famous for her cold attitude, and slowly becomes attracted to her.

That protagonist finds himself in a consulting relationship with a plain girl in glasses at his part-time job.

He doesn’t realize that the girl he is consulting is the same girl he is in love with, and just keeps telling her about his growing feelings while continuing to fall in love with her.

The heroine realizes that the person he is in love with is herself, and although she is embarrassed by the protagonist’ feelings, she gradually becomes attracted to him.

Videogames x Showa Culture x Glamour! A voluptuous and fascinating book for those that enjoy the Showa Era and playing video games! A large collection of stories, published in Harta by Benitsubaki's author, Takahashi Hirona, all in one volume!

Two glamorous folk tales, including "Glamorous-suteyama", a glamorous rearrangement of the Ubasuteyama legend!
When a witch fostering a planet sprays it with some water, torrential rains begin to pour from above in "My first planet"
"Shiramari" is a super idol whose singing voice makes people so happy they could die!
And of course, the series of 16 shorts "It's okay to play games", the antithesis of being given a cold look while you're playing video games!

Full of bright, fantastical ideas, all these gems from Harta's new wave, Takahashi Hirona, in a single volume!

Hitori Gotou is a high school girl who's starting to learn to play the guitar because she dreams of being in a band, 
but she's so shy that she hasn't made a single friend. 
However her dream might come true after she meets Nijika Ijichi, a drummer girl looking for a new guitarist for her band.
description.es: Bocchi The Rock! cuenta la historia de Goto Hitori, una chica de secundaria que empieza a aprender a tocar la guitarra persiguiendo su sueño de formar parte de una banda. Pese a que es muy dedicada, su arrolladora timidez le impide poder conseguir siquiera una amiga. Pero cuando conozca a Ijichi Nijika, una baterista que está buscando una nueva guitarrista para su grupo, Goto dará el primer paso para cumplir su gran sueño página a página, tira a tira.
description.it:
Hitori Goto è una liceale che inizia a imparare a suonare la chitarra perchè il suo sogno è di entrare a far parte di una band, 
ma è talmente timida da non avere nemmeno un amico. 
Ma il suo sogno potrebbe avverarsi in seguito all'incontro con Nijika Ijichi, una ragazza che suona la batteria 
ed è alla ricerca proprio di un chitarrista per la band in cui suona.
description.ja:
「ぼっちちゃん」こと後藤ひとりは、ギターを愛する孤独な少女。
家で一人寂しく弾くだけの毎日でしたが、ひょんなことから伊地知虹夏が率いる「結束バンド」に加入することに。
人前での演奏に不慣れな後藤は、立派なバンドマンになれるのか――！？
全国のぼっちな少年少女に届ける、いま最高にアツい音楽漫画！！
陰キャならロックをやれ！！！
description.pt-br:
Hitori Gotou é uma colegial que está começando a aprender a tocar violão porque sonha em fazer parte de uma banda, mas é tão tímida que não fez um único amigo. No entanto, seu sonho pode se tornar realidade depois que ela conhece Nijika Ijichi, uma garota que toca bateria e está procurando um novo guitarrista para sua banda.

[ 1° TEMP.  DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 2, Cap 21. ]

title.en: Charming the Duke of the North

altTitles.fr: Je vais séduire le Duc du Nord

altTitles.ja: 北部公爵を誘惑します

altTitles.vi: Kế hoạch là quyến rũ công tước phương bắc

description.en:
"Pretend to be my lover and join the social circle."

Selena, the top star that had the entire world's attention, was suddenly warped to Northern Duke's land during an accident while filming. Kalcion, the Northern Duke that saved her from the infernal beasts, offers Selena a chance to go back home in return for collecting information in various social circles by pretending to be his lover. Selena quickly accepts Kalcion's offer, but… 

"Why in the world can't you do this!?"

 "Don't you think that the answer to that should be obvious to you, the actress, not to me, the duke?"

There was a critical problem. The Northern Duke's acting skills are horrible!

"…Let's change the plan. I'll seduce you instead."

And thus the contractual relationship between the two started. Will Kalcion's acting skill improve first, or will he start to have true feelings for Selena instead?

---
Rinha, Korea's most beloved actress, gets into an accident while on set. When she regains consciousness, she realizes she has traveled to the Kingdom of Iklein and meets the northern duke Calcion, who saves her from a demonic beast. Calcion asks her to be his fake lover so she can get into socialite and discover the conspiracy happening in his castle.

---

description.fr:
«Prétendre être mon amant et rejoindre le cercle social.»

Selena, la top star qui avait l'attention du monde entier, a soudainement atterrit dans le pays du Duc du Nord lors d'un accident de tournage. Kalcion, le duc du Nord qui l'a sauvée des bêtes infernales, offre à Selena une chance de rentrer chez elle en échange de la collecte d'informations dans divers cercles sociaux en prétendant être son amant. Selena accepte rapidement l'offre de Kalcion, mais...

«Pourquoi diable ne pouvez-vous pas pas faire ça?»

«Ne pensez-vous pas que la réponse à cette question devrait être évidente pour vous, l'actrice, et non pour moi, le duc?»

Il y avait un problème crucial. Les compétences d'acteur du Duc du Nord étaient horribles!

«...Changeons de plan. Je vais vous séduire à la place.»

Et c'est ainsi que la relation contractuelle entre les deux commença. Le talent d'acteur de Kalcion va-t-il s'améliorer en premier, ou va-t-il commencer à éprouver de vrais sentiments pour Selena?

---
Selena, une super star sous les feux de la rampe, se retrouve par accident sur les terres du Duc du Nord alors qu'elle était en plein tournage. Kalcion, le duc, la sauve des bêtes sauvages qui la menacent et lui offre une chance de retourner dans son monde. En échange, elle doit se faire passer pour sa petite amie et glaner des informations sur les réseaux sociaux. Selena accepte la proposition du duc, mais le Duc du Nord est un très mauvais acteur. Selena se met donc en tête de le séduire pour que la réalité rattrappe la fiction et que leur relation paraisse vraisemblable.

---

Все внимание мира было приковано к главной звезде, Селене, которая в результате катастрофы в процессе съемок случайно попала на территории Северного Герцога. Спасенная от зверей-демонов Кальционом, Северным Герцогом, она получает от него предложение предоставлять ему информацию из разных светских кругов в качестве его мнимой любовницы. В обмен он вернет ее домой. Недолго думая, Селена соглашается, но что ждет ее дальше…

description.uk:
Селена, головна зірка, яка привернула увагу всього світу, раптово потрапила на землю Північного Герцога потрапив у аварію під час зйомок. Кальціон, північний герцог, який врятував її від божевільних звірів, пропонує Селені шанс повернутися додому в обмін на збір інформації в різних соціальних колах, прикидаючись його коханою. Селена швидко приймає пропозицію Кальціона, але… «Чому ви самі не можете цього зробити!?» «Чи не здається вам, що відповідь на це має бути очевидною для вас, акторки, а не для мене, герцога?» Виникла критична проблема. Акторські здібності північного герцога жахливі! «…Давайте змінимо план. Натомість я спокушу вас». І таким чином між ними почалися договірні відносини. Чи покращиться акторська майстерність Кальціона, чи натомість він почне відчувати справжні почуття до Селени?

description.vi:
Seolena, nữ minh tinh xinh đẹp hàng đầu thế giới. Một ngày nọ, khi đang quay phim thì cô bất ngờ gặp tai nạn.
Khi mở mắt ra thì đã ở một thế giới khác và chạm mặt với công tước phương Bắc. Để có thể sống sót, Seolena đã ký hợp đồng với công tước Kalcion.
Kalcion sẽ giúp cô trở về thế giới của mình, còn cô sẽ đóng giả làm người yêu hắn, giúp hắn tìm ra mối đe doạ đằng sau mình.
Nhưng…diễn xuất của công tước thật tệ hại. Cô đành phải quyến rũ công tước vậy. Sau nhiều chuyện xảy ra, ánh mắt của công tước nhìn cô trở nên khác thường.
Phải chăng diễn xuất của công tước đã tiến bộ hay thật sự có cảm tình với cô rồi…?

description.pt-br:
“Finja ser minha amante e participe dos círculos sociais.”

Selena, uma estrela que atraiu a atenção do mundo todo, repentinamente foi parar nas terras do Duque do Norte após um acidente durante as filmagens. 

Kalcion, o Duque do Norte, que a salvou de bestas infernais, oferece a ela chance de voltar para casa em troca de coletar informações em vários círculos sociais, fingindo ser sua amante. 

Selena aceitou rapidamente a oferta de Kalcion, mas…

“Por que diabos você não consegue fazer isso?!”

“Não acha que a resposta deveria ser óbvia para você a atriz, e não para mim, o duque?”

Surgiu um problema crítico. 

As habilidades de atuação do duque são terríveis!

“… Vamos mudar o plano. Em vez disso, vou seduzi-lo.”

E assim, a relação contratual entre os dois começou.

A habilidade de atuação de Kalcion irá melhorar primeiro, ou ele começará a ter sentimentos verdadeiros por Selena?

---

兼具美貌與演技、獲獎無數的頂級演員薛璘夏在一場拍攝中發生意外，並因此掉入另一個陌生次元，正當她遭遇魔獸襲擊時，伊克萊茵王國的北方公爵凱爾希溫救下了她，意外相遇的兩人也就此達成了一樁祕密交易。
